p: Meanwhile, Citrus limon has been found to significantly lower AChE brain depression in APP/PS1 and wild-type C57BL/6L (WT) mice. PSD95/synaptophysin, the synaptic density index, was substantially improved in histopathological shifts [ 109]. Based on the previous analysis by other researchers, nobiletin 3′,4′,5,6,7,8-hexamethoxyflavone was found to be the major component of polymethoxylated flavones in citrus peels, such as C. depressa, C. reticulata, C. sinensis, and C. limon [ 214, 215]. Thus, nobiletin may potentially be the compound that substantially alters the development of these diseases. Other than that, Acori graminei, which was found to be rich in β-asarone, enhanced cognitive function of AβPP/PS1 mice and decreased neuronal apoptosis in the AβPP/PS1 mouse cortex. In addition, a substantial increase in the expression of CaMKII/CREB/Bcl-2 was observed in the cortex of AβPP/PS1 mice treated with β-asarone.
